scenes.description: Continuation and conclusion of the performance for 'Haikei Doppelganger'.
scenes.song_name: 拝啓ドッペルゲンガー (Haikei Doppelganger)

scenes.description: Logo animation for #CHU2BAE Hakos Baelz 3D Live.
MC segment where Hakos Baelz introduces the #CHU2BAE merch set.
Detailed presentation of the JDONMY T-Shirt.
Presentation of the JDONMY Acrylic Stand.
Presentation of the Cage of Ice Tray.
Introduction of the Situational Voice Pack.
Closing the live and presenting the full set purchase bonus (signed card).
Outro music and credits roll showing guests and staff.

subtitles.original: 上手くやれよ ルンパッパ
subtitles.english: Do it well, runpappa.

subtitles.original: どうもこんにちは 君の分身です
subtitles.english: Hello there. I am your alter ego.

subtitles.original: Whoa! Thank you so much for watching
subtitles.english: Whoa! Thank you so much for watching

subtitles.original: my #CHU2BAE Live today!
subtitles.english: my #CHU2BAE Live today!

subtitles.original: I can feel myself floating away...
subtitles.english: I can feel myself floating away...

subtitles.original: ...spiritually, psychologically, and physically.
subtitles.english: ...spiritually, psychologically, and physically.

subtitles.original: But...
subtitles.english: But...

subtitles.original: ...it wouldn't be a live without a shill-taro!
subtitles.english: ...it wouldn't be a live without a shill-taro!

subtitles.original: I present to you the #CHU2BAE Merch Set!
subtitles.english: I present to you the #CHU2BAE Merch Set!

subtitles.original: Ta-da-da-da!
subtitles.english: Ta-da-da-da!

subtitles.original: First up, we have an—I can't believe
subtitles.english: First up, we have an—I can't believe

subtitles.original: the words are coming out of my mouth—
subtitles.english: the words are coming out of my mouth—

subtitles.original: the official...
subtitles.english: the official...

subtitles.original: ...JDONMY T-Shirt!
subtitles.english: ...JDONMY T-Shirt!

subtitles.original: なんということですかこれは!?
subtitles.english: What on earth is this!?

subtitles.original: I can't believe it's come to this.
subtitles.english: I can't believe it's come to this.

subtitles.original: But yes, I've made the official 'Jdon' shirt for you all.
subtitles.english: But yes, I've made the official 'Jdon' shirt for you all.

subtitles.original: Um, the art was done by the ever-so-talented Dino.
subtitles.english: Um, the art was done by the ever-so-talented Dino.

subtitles.original: Thank you so much for making
subtitles.english: Thank you so much for making

subtitles.original: the Chunni shirt of my dreams!
subtitles.english: the Chunni shirt of my dreams!

subtitles.original: It looks so cool! I'm in the pose.
subtitles.english: It looks so cool! I'm in the pose.

subtitles.original: You can wear this to all your Chunni outings,
subtitles.english: You can wear this to all your Chunni outings,

subtitles.original: or just every day at home, because every day is a Chunni day.
subtitles.english: or just every day at home, because every day is a Chunni day.

subtitles.original: Please get the T-shirt! It is official.
subtitles.english: Please get the T-shirt! It is official.

subtitles.original: I have a 'jdon my soul' t... I can't believe it.
subtitles.english: I have a 'jdon my soul' t... I can't believe it.

subtitles.original: Hi! Okay, next!
subtitles.english: Hi! Okay, next!

subtitles.original: We have—da-da-da-da—we have the acrylic stand...
subtitles.english: We have—da-da-da-da—we have the acrylic stand...

subtitles.original: ...of the wonderful 'Jdon' artwork that Dino has drawn.
subtitles.english: ...of the wonderful 'Jdon' artwork that Dino has drawn.

subtitles.original: So you can make your home even more Chunni.
subtitles.english: So you can make your home even more Chunni.

subtitles.original: This entire set is just making your entire life Chunni.
subtitles.english: This entire set is just making your entire life Chunni.

subtitles.original: Isn't it amazing?
subtitles.english: Isn't it amazing?

subtitles.original: You can never have enough acrylic stands,
subtitles.english: You can never have enough acrylic stands,

subtitles.original: so please consider adding this to your collection. Yes, yes!
subtitles.english: so please consider adding this to your collection. Yes, yes!

subtitles.original: Okay, next!
subtitles.english: Okay, next!

subtitles.original: Yes, there's still more! Now, to be initiated as a true Chunni,
subtitles.english: Yes, there's still more! Now, to be initiated as a true Chunni,

subtitles.original: you have to be carrying a secret medallion that no one knows about,
subtitles.english: you have to be carrying a secret medallion that no one knows about,

subtitles.original: because it will give you secret powers of the Chunni.
subtitles.english: because it will give you secret powers of the Chunni.

subtitles.original: So, I present to you a special medallion that has the powers of the Jdon...
subtitles.english: So, I present to you a special medallion that has the powers of the Jdon...

subtitles.original: ...Jdon engraved into the front and back so that you never forget your Chunni soul
subtitles.english: ...Jdon engraved into the front and back so that you never forget your Chunni soul

subtitles.original: wherever you are. You have to carry this wherever you go
subtitles.english: wherever you are. You have to carry this wherever you go

subtitles.original: in order to be a true Chunni. Yes, yes, yes!
subtitles.english: in order to be a true Chunni. Yes, yes, yes!

subtitles.original: Okay, next!
subtitles.english: Okay, next!

subtitles.original: Next we have the 'Cage of Ice' tray because Hakos Baelz
subtitles.english: Next we have the 'Cage of Ice' tray because Hakos Baelz

subtitles.original: is forever trapped in a cage of ice,
subtitles.english: is forever trapped in a cage of ice,

subtitles.original: and you can experience that too by making custom ice cubes of my face!
subtitles.english: and you can experience that too by making custom ice cubes of my face!

subtitles.original: And also Los Squeakos, and also there's like cheese and other stuff.
subtitles.english: And also Los Squeakos, and also there's like cheese and other stuff.

subtitles.original: But you know me, ice isn't enough,
subtitles.english: But you know me, ice isn't enough,

subtitles.original: so there's a possibility that it could withstand some heat,
subtitles.english: so there's a possibility that it could withstand some heat,

subtitles.original: maybe even some baked goods? I don't know.
subtitles.english: maybe even some baked goods? I don't know.

subtitles.original: Please check the product description before use, of course. But whoa!
subtitles.english: Please check the product description before use, of course. But whoa!

subtitles.original: The possibility is there. I don't know.
subtitles.english: The possibility is there. I don't know.

subtitles.original: Anyway, next!
subtitles.english: Anyway, next!

subtitles.original: This time we also have a voice pack that narrates the life of a Chunni Rat.
subtitles.english: This time we also have a voice pack that narrates the life of a Chunni Rat.

subtitles.original: It follows the journey of a Chunni princess who's been cast to the human world in hiding,
subtitles.english: It follows the journey of a Chunni princess who's been cast to the human world in hiding,

subtitles.original: waiting to return while anticipating the attack of the century.
subtitles.english: waiting to return while anticipating the attack of the century.

subtitles.original: Believe it or not, this is based off an actual fanfic that I wrote by hand
subtitles.english: Believe it or not, this is based off an actual fanfic that I wrote by hand

subtitles.original: that will never see the day of light... again.
subtitles.english: that will never see the day of light... again.

subtitles.original: The day of light? Did I just say that? The light of day again.
subtitles.english: The day of light? Did I just say that? The light of day again.

subtitles.original: Thank you very much! Next!
subtitles.english: Thank you very much! Next!

subtitles.original: Last but not least, we have the full set purchase bonus item, which is
subtitles.english: Last but not least, we have the full set purchase bonus item, which is

subtitles.original: the official 'Jdon' card that is signed by yours truly.
subtitles.english: the official 'Jdon' card that is signed by yours truly.

subtitles.original: Honestly, I said I was never gonna do this again. But it was Chunni merch, I had to!
subtitles.english: Honestly, I said I was never gonna do this again. But it was Chunni merch, I had to!

subtitles.original: I will be signing every single card of every single person's full set purchase.
subtitles.english: I will be signing every single card of every single person's full set purchase.

subtitles.original: So please consider purchasing the full set, because I want all of you guys to be part of the Jdon club.
subtitles.english: So please consider purchasing the full set, because I want all of you guys to be part of the Jdon club.

subtitles.original: Thank you so much for the support as always, and I really hope you enjoyed this performance live.
subtitles.english: Thank you so much for the support as always, and I really hope you enjoyed this performance live.

subtitles.original: I really, really pushed myself to the limit this time, so I hope it paid off.
subtitles.english: I really, really pushed myself to the limit this time, so I hope it paid off.

subtitles.original: Um, there's also the membership portion of this live, so it's not over yet!
subtitles.english: Um, there's also the membership portion of this live, so it's not over yet!

subtitles.original: It includes a very, very special performance.
subtitles.english: It includes a very, very special performance.

subtitles.original: So please join the Rat Pack if you haven't already. I'll see you guys there!
subtitles.english: So please join the Rat Pack if you haven't already. I'll see you guys there!

subtitles.original: I am incapable of thinking anymore, so I'm-a just end it here.
subtitles.english: I am incapable of thinking anymore, so I'm-a just end it here.

subtitles.original: Jdon my soul! Please get the merch! Whoa!
subtitles.english: Jdon my soul! Please get the merch! Whoa!

subtitles.original: #CHU2BAE for life! Thank you!
subtitles.english: #CHU2BAE for life! Thank you!

subtitles.original: CHU2BAEは命!
subtitles.english: CHU2BAE is life!
